TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k oʊ s t ɛ l ə æ s k h ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː s iː n z v ɪ z h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m s t ɔːɹ ɹ s ɪ k s p ɹ ɪ n z s p uː n z s oʊ f ɚ f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː s f aɪ v s t ɪ k s l æ b z ʌ v ɐ b l uː tʃ iː θ æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ æ ð b ɔː ɡ v iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m oʊ p l æ s t eɪ s n eɪ k æ n d d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oːɹ f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː s ʃ iː k æ n s k ɹ uː ð iː s s ɪ n z ɪ n t uː s ɹ iː t ɹ aɪ t b æ ɡ z æ n d ɐ v ɪ v ɪ ɡ oʊ m ɪ h ɚ v ɛ n s t eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
